title: 12/31/20 – HOUR 2 – The Great Deshaun Watson Debate: Part 2. PLUS, Shawne Merriman!
itunes:title: 12/31/20 – HOUR 2 – The Great Deshaun Watson Debate: Part 2. PLUS, Shawne Merriman!
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Rob Parker fill in for Dan Patrick and Doug further explains his reasoning for claiming that Deshaun Watson is “massively overrated” on Tuesday’s show. They speak with former NFL linebacker and current Lights Out Podcast host Shawne Merriman about the top quarterbacks in the league and whether or not the Packers wasted a draft pick on Jordan Love. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Doug Gottlieb and Rob Parker fill in for Dan Patrick and Doug further explains his reasoning for claiming that Deshaun Watson is “massively overrated” on Tuesday’s show. They speak with former NFL linebacker and current Lights Out Podcast host Shawne Merriman about the top quarterbacks in the league and whether or not the Packers wasted a draft pick on Jordan Love.
